plot: Prelude: Sir John Lubbock says "Life's a Game" like the game of cards, fate deals each hand, daily, face down. In life, "It is not always in holding a good hand but in playing a bad band ...
title: Life's a Game of Cards
plot_es: Prelude: Sir John Lubbock says "Life's a Game" like the game of cards, fate deals each hand, daily, face down. In life, "It is not always in holding a good hand but in playing a bad band ...
